sections.text:
77-3171.Adoption Tax Credit Act, how cited.

Sections 77-3171 to 77-3173 shall be known and may be cited as the Adoption Tax Credit Act.

SourceLaws 2025, LB647, ยง 7.Operative Date: September 3, 2025

sections.heading: 77-3171 to 77-3173 shall be known and may be cited as the Adoption Tax Credit Act.
